    @allure.title('Test - test the paramter are case-insensitive ')
    def test_get_device_case_sensitive(self,base_api):
        macAddress = "e4:6c:d1:43:44:0e"
        params={"macAddress": macAddress}
        response = base_api.get_list_by_param(endpoint,params)
        assert response.status_code == 200
    
    
        params={"macAddress": macAddress.upper()}
        response_upper = base_api.get_list_by_param(endpoint,params)
        assert response_upper.status_code == 200
